title: Slow Cooker Macaroni & Cheese
directions: Boil the macaroni in a 2 quart saucepan in plenty of water until tender, about 7 minutes. Drain.
In a medium saucepan, mix butter and cheese. Stir until the cheese melts.
In a slow cooker, combine cheese/butter mixture and add the eggs, sour cream, soup, salt, milk, mustard and pepper and stir well.
Then add drained macaroni and stir again.
In a medium saucepan, mix butter and cheese. Stir until the cheese melts.
In a slow cooker, combine cheese/butter mixture and add the eggs, sour cream, soup, salt, milk, mustard and pepper and stir well.
Add cooked and drained macaroni and stir again.
Set the slow cooker on low and cook for 3 hours, stirring occasionally.
Salt and Pepper ( lightly) meat and brown in olive oil on both sides-then set aside.
Put half of the carrots, onion, celery and potatoes into the crock pot.
Put the other half of the veggies/potatoes on top of the meat.
Mix together the beef broth, brown sugar, ketchup, worcestershire sauce, and seasoned salt. Pour Mix over the meat/veggies.
Cook on High setting for first hour then turn down to low and cook for another 7 hours ( more or less). test seasonings before serving and add additional salt and pepper if neccessary.
ingredients: 2 1⁄2 cups grated sharp cheddar cheese or 10 ounces sharp cheddar cheese
1 (10 3/4 ounce) can condensed cheddar cheese soup
8 ounces cooked elbow macaroni, cooked 2/3 time the directions call for
1 (10 3/4 ounce) can condensed cheddar cheese soup
8 carrots, peeled and cut into chunks
1 large onion, peeled and sliced thick
